SELECT A.EQUIPMENT_FRAG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.USER_EQUIP_FRAG_NUM, A.`STATUS`, A.CREATE_TIME, A.NFT_ID, A.FROM_TYPE, C.EQUIP_NAME, C.EQUIP_RARECODE, C.DESCRIPTION, D.USER_NAME FROM GM_USER_EQUIPMENT_FRAG A LEFT JOIN GM_EQUIPMENT_FRAG B ON A.EQUIPMENT_FRAG_ID = B.EQUIPMENT_FRAG_ID LEFT JOIN GM_EQUIPMENT_INFO C ON B.EQUIPMENT_ID = C.EQUIP_ID LEFT JOIN GM_USER D ON A.USER_ID = D.USER_ID
${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY A.EQUIPMENT_FRAG_ID , A.USER_ID , A.USER_EQUIP_FRAG_NUM , A.`STATUS` , A.CREATE_TIME ,A.NFT_ID, A.FROM_TYPE , C.EQUIP_NAME , D.USER_NAME ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC , A.USER_EQUIP_FRAG_NUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS EQUIP_FRAG_NUM, A.NFT_ID, B.EQUIPMENT_ID AS EQUIP_ID, B.EQUIP_FRAG_ICON_URL, C.EQUIP_NAME, C.DESCRIPTION, C.EQUIP_RARECODE FROM GM_USER_EQUIPMENT_FRAG A LEFT JOIN GM_EQUIPMENT_FRAG B ON A.EQUIPMENT_FRAG_ID = B.EQUIPMENT_FRAG_ID LEFT JOIN GM_EQUIPMENT_INFO C ON B.EQUIPMENT_ID = C.EQUIP_ID WHERE A.`STATUS` = '1' AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY A.EQUIPMENT_FRAG_ID, A.NFT_ID, B.EQUIPMENT_ID, C.EQUIP_NAME, C.EQUIP_RARECODE
